entry.title: $2100 // King Size 2 bed!Huge living area!Near PROSPECT PARK&Subway!MUST SEE!
entry.content:
Apartment Features: Dining Area; Kitchen: Open; Pullman; Home Office; |Guarantor Allowed: Yes; Pet Policy: Pets Allowed.

Building Description: Voice Intercom; Walk-Up; Pre-war; Built 1931; Townhouse; 4 Floors; 8 Apartments


Apartment Summary

Just Listed-Beautiful 2 King size bedroom with tons of Character. The building is a beautiful Brownstone located on one of the best blocks in Crown heights! - Tree lined block Two more apartments are available in this building. Unit Features: High ceiling, is very bright, gorgeous oak hardwood flooring, decorative fireplace, large windows, tiled bathroom, storage space. Next to the A, C, 3 and LIRR at Nostrand Avenue. Bus lines: B65, B49, B44. Located in the heart of great shopping centers, restaurants and grocery stores. Heat and hot water are included in the rent.

To schedule viewing contact show contact info
